description:
The Non-Sales Managerâ€™s Guide to Managing The Sales Team is designed for business owners who have sales people and act as the sales manager but they are not full time sales managers. Since you have other responsibilities running the company, how can you get the sales team bring in the Big Kahunas without having to micro-manage every moment? You need some tools!

An hour and 45 minutes of video, transcripts, templates, worksheets all included

Turn chaos into order with practical, no fluff, no theory just real sales management tools that work.
title: The Non-Sales Manager's Guide to Managing the Sales Team
